title: 非常好地基标志，上传更多，爱来自斯派克海胆.pptx
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:bedrock]]

[[module CSS]]

:root {

    --basalt-bright-element-color: 124,104,238;
    --basalt-dark-element-color: 84,58,233;
    --basalt-alternate-color: 144,126,241;
    --basalt-sub-text-color: 124,104,238;
    --basalt-undertone: 124,104,238;

   --header-logo-size: 80%;
    --header-logo: url(https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/o9logo.png);
}

#header h1 a::before {
    filter: invert(1);
}

:root:lang(cn) {
    --header-title: 'OxygenNine';
    --header-subtitle: 'Lost In Dream';
}

.footnotes-footer .footnote-footer > a:first-child {
    background-color: transparent;
}

.o-logo {
    display: grid;
    grid: auto-flow / 1fr 1fr 1fr;
    justify-items: stretch;
    align-items: stretch;
    width: calc(100% - 1em);
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.grd {
    width: auto;
    border: solid 2px #eee;
    background: #3c3c3c;
    padding: 1em 1em 0em 1em;
    margin-bottom: 1em;
    transition: scale 0.4s , filter 0.4s;
    display: grid;
    z-index:1;
}

.grd img {
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-height: 11em;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 10px #ffffffaa);
}

.grd:hover {
filter: drop-shadow(9px 12px 0px #eee);
scale: 1.2;
z-index:2;
}

span.od {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    background: #fff;
    color: #4a4a4a;
    transform: translateY(10px);
    border: solid 2px #eee;
    font-weight: bold;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #00000057;
    height:fit-content;
}

.grdw img {
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-width: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 10px #ffffffaa);
}

.w img {
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height: unset;
}

.w {margin-bottom:1em;}

[[/module]]

[[=image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/artp1.png]]

[[=]]
[[Module RATE]]

img这个逆天图床把原艺作页的图全炸了，因此这边新开一个页面顺便重置一下这些东西。CC-BY-SA 4.0，随意使用。
[[/=]]

-----

++ LOGOs
真的没那么多刺。大部分为SVG格式[[footnote]] 光效是CSS效果，实际的图片是不带发光的 [[/footnote]]。

[!--

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image ]]
[[span class="od"]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

--]

[[div class="o-logo"]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-o5.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]O5议会(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-o6.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]O6议会(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-o4.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]O4指令部(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-o3.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]O3法庭(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-depofparaastronomy.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]超天文学部(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-mirco.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]微生物学部(V2)[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-sdecotw.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]站点主管全体执行委员会
（SDECotW）[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-idcard.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]信息削减、审查及抹消部
（IDCaRD）（V2）[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-publicfakeinformation.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]公共虚假信息部[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-goi.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]超常组织审议部（V2）[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-yblhs.png]]
[[span class="od"]]亚伯拉罕司[PNG][[footnote]] 如果谁有战术神学部logo的SVG版本麻烦v我一份 [[/footnote]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-foundationstar1.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]基金会之星[上色][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-foundationstar2.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]基金会之星[平面][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-lunar63.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]月背63号站
出自[[[SCP-CN-3999-EX |月球陨落]]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-dointer.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]互联网部
[[[SCP-CN-2091 |传 世 经 典]]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-constru.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]工程学部
--这里必须打胶啊--[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-alternate.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]异常邪教部。
哪个邪教不异常啊？[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-filesfix.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]文件修复处
要我说他们的修复效率就是个勾⑧[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-exdep.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]解明及研究处。
但我没在-EX文里面看到他们过[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-transp.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]物流与运输处……呃？[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/o-logo-fanta.svg]]
[[span class="od"]]幻象计划，出自夏征整活
这文现在有个简称叫[[[kawaii-O5-3 |五三烧]]][[/span]]
[[/div]]


[[/div]]

-----
++ 壁纸
壁纸捏

[[div class="o-logo" style="grid: auto-flow / 1fr 1fr;"]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp1.png]]
[[span class="od"]]O5议会[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp2.png]]
[[span class="od"]]O6议会[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp3.png]]
[[span class="od"]]超越深空和星辰[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp4.png]]
[[span class="od"]]生命不能承受之荣耀[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/MOSHED-2022-12-31-22-48-27.jpg]]
[[span class="od"]]超形上学永远旋转。[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp5.png]]
[[span class="od"]]大风车呀转啊转啊转，这里的超形上学真好看[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp6.png]]
[[span class="od"]]个人认为最帅的一张[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/o9-ppt/wp7.png]]
[[span class="od"]]超宽屏考虑下？[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/hubheader.png]]
[[span class="od"]]通往昆仑的路途已然陨落，
人类的未来又将怎样启程？[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd w"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/dkvp3.png]]
[[span class="od"]]瞭望者之陨[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

-----
++ 其他什么玩意
一些其他的东西

[[div class="o-logo"]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/pataEye.png]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]

-----
++ 更杂的杂项
[[div class="o-logo"]]

[[div class="grd"]]

= 超形上学部旋转1分钟.avi
[[span class="od"]]这个logo不是我做的，
但肯定有人在找这个转圈的超形上学部动画
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]

[[div class="grd"]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/o9logo.png]]
[[span class="od"]]Keep the dream![[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="grd"]]
[[image https://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/oxygen9-files/4moon]]

[[/div]]

author: OxygenNine
